thread.title: Police seeking permission to remove cats from hoarding home
thread.title_full: Police seeking permission to remove cats from hoarding home

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Police seeking permission to remove cats from hoarding home
text: A team of Genesee County Animal Control officers went out to the home in the 10000 block of Grand Blanc Road near Van Vleet Road Tuesday, Feb. 14 to evaluate the cats after Gaines Township police and firefighters responded for a welfare call over a 60-year-old man that lives on the property.
